data.title: Block Documentation - Block Event Responses List

data: Below is a list of all the available Block Event Responses within Minecraft:Bedrock Edition for use with [Block Triggers](BlockTriggerList.md).

data.Name: [add_mob_effect](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_add_mob_effect.md)
data.Description: Apply mob effect to a target.

data.Name: [die](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_die.md)
data.Description: Kill target. If the target is self and this is run from a block then destroy the block.

data.Name: [play_effect](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_play_effect.md)
data.Description: Spawns a particle effect relative to the target position.

data.Name: [play_sound](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_play_sound.md)
data.Description: Play a sound relative to the target position.

data.Name: [remove_mob_effect](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_remove_mob_effect.md)
data.Description: Removes mob effect from the target.

data.Name: [run_command](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_run_command.md)
data.Description: Triggers a slash command or a list of slash commands.

data.Name: [set_block](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_set_block.md)
data.Description: Sets this block to another block type.

data.Name: [set_block_at_pos](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_set_block_at_pos.md)
data.Description: Sets a block relative to this block to another block type.

data.Name: [set_block_property](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_set_block_property.md)
data.Description: Sets a block property on this block.

data.Name: [swing](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_swing.md)
data.Description: Event causes the actor to swing.

data.Name: [teleport](BlockEvents/minecraftBlock_teleport.md)
data.Description: Teleport a target randomly around destination point.
